statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.StoreID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
, BB.Name as StoreName
FROM dbo.TCustomerStore AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TStore BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.StoreID = BB.ID WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* , BB.Name as StoreName FROM dbo.TCustomerStore AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TStore BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.StoreID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TCustomerStore ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, CustomerID, StoreID, StartDate, EndDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #CustomerID#, #StoreID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCustomerStore SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , StoreID = #StoreID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
